Package com.ecomDomain.reuseMethods

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Add_Remove_Bag_Util
    Re-Usable methods of Add/Remove Bag Functionality for Retail Sites Also created re-usable methods for DemandWare business flows Some of the DW methods can be optimized and use for other platform based retail site also

    Re-Usable methods of Billing Page Functionality for Retail Sites Also created re-usable methods for DemandWare business flows Some of the DW methods can be optimized and use for other platform based retail site also

    Re-Usable methods of PDP for Retail Sites

    Re-Usable methods of Promotion for Retail Sites
    QV_Util
    Re-Usable methods of QV for Retail Sites

    Re-Usable methods of Search Functionality for Retail Sites Also created re-usable methods for DemandWare business flows Some of the DW methods can be optimized and use for other platform based retail site also
